com.hybris.cis.api.payment.service

Interface PaymentService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CisService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CyberSourcePaymentService, MonerisInteracPaymentService, MonerisPaymentService, PaymentServiceMockImpl, SamplePaymentServiceImpl

    public interface PaymentService
extends CisService
    Provides payment services.

      • authorize

        CisPaymentTransactionResult authorize(CisCreditCardAuthorization paymentRequest)

        Creates a new authorization based on a profile (using ReferencePaymentRequest) or a credit card (CreditCardPaymentRequest).

        Parameters:
        paymentRequest - The payment request
        Returns:
        The payment transaction result

      • reauthorize

        CisPaymentTransactionResult reauthorize(CisPaymentAuthorization paymentRequest,
                                        java.lang.String transactionId,
                                        java.lang.String clientAuthorizationId)
        Reauthorizes the amount based on a previous authorization.
        Parameters:
        paymentRequest - contains details about what to re-authorize (amount, etc.)
        transactionId - the id of the payment transaction related to the previous authorization
        clientAuthorizationId - the client authorization id that was used to create the previous authorization
        Returns:
        the payment transaction result

      • reverse

        CisPaymentTransactionResult reverse(CisPaymentRequest paymentRequest,
                                    java.lang.String transactionId,
                                    java.lang.String clientAuthorizationId)
        Reverses (voids) an authorization.
        Parameters:
        paymentRequest - contains details about what to reverse (amount, etc.)
        transactionId - the id of the payment transaction related to the previous authorization
        clientAuthorizationId - the client authorization id that was used to create the previous authorization
        Returns:
        a payment transaction result

      • handleExternalAuthorization

        CisPaymentTransactionResult handleExternalAuthorization(CisExternalPaymentRequest authorization)
        Completes an asynchronous authorization process (e.g. for a hosted payment authroziation front-end).
        Parameters:
        authorization - a map with details about the authorization
        Returns:
        A payment provider independent result (including status codes, messages, etc.).

      • handleExternalProfile

        CisPaymentProfileResult handleExternalProfile(CisExternalPaymentRequest profile)
        Completes an asynchronous profile process (e.g. for a hosted payment profile front-end).
        Parameters:
        profile - a map with details about the payment profile
        Returns:
        A payment provider independent result (including status codes, messages, etc.).

      • setupAuthorizationGroup

        CisTokenizedPaymentTransactionResult setupAuthorizationGroup(CisTokenizedPaymentAuthorization tokenizedPaymentAuthorization)
        Create an authorization group. This group can then be linked to different authorizations. This can be used for an order with multiple authorizations.
        Parameters:
        tokenizedPaymentAuthorization - the payment authorization request
        Returns:
        the transaction result

                                                      java.lang.String authorizationGroupId)
        Create an authorization based on a previously created authorization group.
        Parameters:
        paymentRequest - tokenized payment request
        authorizationGroupId - id of the authorization group to authorize on
        Returns:
        the transaction result
